name: Who kills Who?
description:
Who Kills Who?

Red kills Green, Green Kills Blue and Blue kills Red, but you can make a twist and change Who Kills Who, making Blue kills Green, Green kills Red and Red kills Blue.

The goal is to keep the alone color alive in the end.

How to play

  • You must keep the color indicated in the bottom of screen alive.
  • You can change Who Kills Who pressing ENTER.
  • Press SPACE in the game over to try again.

Credits

  • developed by Diego Giacomelli
  • assets by Kenney 
  • sounds by  Peter Wayne

Game developed  for Trijam #154: The 3 hour game jam

https://itch.io/jam/trijam-154

Theme: "There is a twist..."
